message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,150,000.  I believe this price is fair considering the value it holds for you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,000,000. I believe this price is more in line with my budget and the value I can get from the product.

Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  I'm willing to come down to $1,075,000 for the product. This price still reflects the significant value it offers you, and it's a good compromise. Let's see if we can finalize this deal.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950,000. I believe this price is more in line with my budget and the value I can get from the product. I'm willing to make a serious offer, so I hope we can meet in the middle.
